english.segment1: Head hurts. back here again, I. painted the walls, the cracks remain, and. I fear, to close my eyes, become accustomed, so dig in. Every time, I breathe this air, the sick stench, never seems to go away.
english.segment2: You fail, You break, You freak, You falter, You lie, You kill, You burn, Youre nothing..(x 2). to me..
english.segment3: Head hurts. back here again, I. painted the walls, the cracks remain, and. every time, I breathe this air, the sick stench, it never seems to go away, ..go away. . .
english.segment4: You fail, You break, You freak, You falter, You lie, You kill, You burn, Youre nothing..(x 2)
english.segment5: I feel it changing, the air..clean.. its you..
english.segment6: You fail, You break, You freak, You falter, You lie, You kill, You burn, Youre nothing..(x 2)
